summary: Defines a set of specialized exception classes used by Djangoâ€™s migration framework to represent distinct error conditions such as ambiguous migration name prefixes, malformed migration files, circular dependencies, inconsistent migration history, unresolved model base classes, irreversible migrations, and missing nodes in dependency graphs.
business_intent: Enable precise error reporting and handling for migration operations, allowing developers and tools to detect, catch, and respond to specific migration-related problems during database schema evolution.
